Constructor Detail

ModuleHandler

public ModuleHandler(BotAction botAction,
                     java.lang.String modulePath,
                     java.lang.String moduleGroup)
This method initializes a new ModuleHandler class.

Parameters:
modulePath - is the path of the module .class files.
moduleGroup - is the name of the group of modules. All of the module files must begin with this string.
botAction - is the botAction of the bot.
Method Detail

loadModule

public void loadModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
This method loads a module into the handler.

Parameters:
moduleName - is the name of the module to load.

unloadModule

public void unloadModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
This method unloads a module.

Parameters:
moduleName - is the name of the module to unload.

isLoaded

public boolean isLoaded(java.lang.String moduleName)
This method checks to see if a module is loaded.

Parameters:
moduleName - is the name of the module to load.
true - is returned if the module is loaded.

isModule

public boolean isModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
This method checks to see if a module is able to be loaded.

Parameters:
moduleName - is the module name to check.
Returns:
true is returned if the module can be loaded.

getModule

public Module getModule(java.lang.String moduleName)
This method gets a loaded Module instance from the module list.

Parameters:
moduleName - is the name of the module to get.

getModuleNames

public java.util.Collection getModuleNames()
This method gets a sorted list of the modules that the module handler is able to load. The files must begin with the module group name and end with .class. It must also not have a $ in the name.

Returns:
a sorted collection of module names is returned.

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(SubspaceEvent event)
This method handles all of the subspace events.

Parameters:
event - is the event to handle.
